attributes.action: make specific price caps on airline prices in re to luggage and seats/other
attributes.background: every day theres new price raises from the airlines and after paying for the ticket and taxes theres always more charges for luggage ,seats, and other services that should generally come free

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
